title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 364.1 - Liability of carrier providing hospital, medical or surgical benefits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 364.1 - Liability of carrier providing hospital, medical or surgical benefits

State Regulations

Under a plan in which the hospital, medical or surgical
benefits and cash disability benefits of the employees covered thereunder are
separately insured by two or more carriers, the carrier insuring the cash
disability benefits shall be solely responsible for the reporting of payrolls
and for the payment of assessments as prescribed under sections 214 and 228 of
the law with regard to the employees insured under such a
plan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

364.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
